texts.en: Mirian is 33 years old, and was not able to achieve an academic credential due to her family's financial circumstances.  She lives with her life partner, who works in agriculture.  She has 3 children who are 7, 11 and 13 years old and are attending school.  Mirian and her partner work together in agriculture to support their family.  Mirian's main activity is growing corn, but she also uses the remains of her corn crop to feed the two cows that she owns.  Her corn crop is located 2 kilometers from her house.  Her children help her and her partner with their work in the field when they are not studying.  The loan will be used to plant 16 hectares of corn, and will be spent on preparing the earth, buying seeds to plant, and buying manure and other fertilizers to care for the crop.  Her dream is to improve her quality of life and be able to raise her three children.  She would have liked to continue studying and have a university degree.  For this reason, Mirian is putting all of her effort and dedication into her work, so as to help her children get ahead and have the opportunities that she did not have.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to prepare the earth, seeds, and manure.

loans.name: Asesewa Group

texts.en:
This group consists of six enterprising members and they are part of the group called Asesewa. They are into the sale of cutlery sets, sewing accessories, underwear, slippers, noddles, drinks, tea, bread, banku, fish, groceries and chicken.

One of them is a woman named Faustina. She is 41-years-old, married and has been selling chicken and cow meat from her home for the past 14 years. Faustina started her business by selling only fish and now the business has grown through different levels of loan cycles. She continues to currently operate a frozen food business. Her loan will be invested in the purchase of cartons of chicken meat, mutton and fish to sell to customers. 

The group has been taken through training, monitoring and guardians. They will need a total amount of GHS 5,500 to expand their businesses.

loans.use: To purchase cartons of chicken meat, mutton and fish

loans.name: Erika Maritza

texts.es:
Erika de 20 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Desde muy joven se acompaño, junto con su compañero de vida día a día luchan por una mejor vida, actualmente tienen un pequeño de 1 añito de edad. Su pareja trabaja en la agricultura y ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, juntos trabajan arduamente. Ella sale todas las mañanas a trabajar a las afueras de la comunidad su experiencia le ha ayudado a tener un buen número de  clientes propios. Cada día trata de ayudar a su esposo para tener la alimentación básica para ellos y su pequeño, El crédito lo utilizara en la compra de un Silo(granero) para guardar Granos básicos(maíz y Frijoles) que cultivan.
A futuro esperan mejorar en todos los ámbitos del negocio, tanto doña Maritza en la venta de ropa como don Osmar en sus cultivos, esto les permitirá salir adelante, tener la alimentación diaria y poder superarse. Juntos sueñan con una vivienda que les permita tener la seguridad y la comodidad que necesitan, Ver un negocio de Ropa mas grande, Y un estilo mejor de vida para su pequeño.
texts.en:
Erika is 20 years old. She is a very enterprising and tenacious woman. Since she was very young, she has had a common-law-partner. Together with her partner, she strives each day for a better life. They have a little son who is only 1 year old. Erika’s partner works in farming and she works selling clothes. Both work very hard. Erika goes every morning to work in the outskirts of the community. Her experience has helped her to find a good number of customers. Each day she tries to help her partner to provide for the basic food for themselves and their baby. She wants to use the credit to buy a granary to keep the basic grains (corn and beans) which they grow.

In the future, they hope to improve all areas of their work: Erika Maritza’s clothing sales as well as her partner Osmar’s cops. This will enable them to get ahead, to have their daily food and to improve their lives. Both dream of having their own home which will help them to have the safety and comfort they need. They also dream of having a larger clothing business and a better quality of life for their baby.

loans.use: to buy a granary to keep their basic grains.

loans.name: Mdidimua Group

texts.en:
Said, who is in his early fifties, is married and has a son and two daughters who are in school. For five years now, he has had two businesses, a café and a dry-food-selling business. He sells dry food such as maize, beans and rice. Said got his food stock from his own farm and from neighbors. He opens his business from 6am to 7pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This is his second loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans, which were paid back in full, to buy a farm where he grows rice and to buy food stock for his café. Said earned an extra income which he used to cover school fees and home food expenses. Said will use this loan to buy food-cooking ingredients for the café. He dreams that one day he will be able to own a successful business and be in a better place in life. 

Said will share this loan with his loan group Mdidimua, which totals ten members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy food-cooking ingredients for his café.

loans.name: Maribel Alexandra

texts.es: Maribel, es una mujer de 32 años de edad, casada tiene 2 niños de 8 y 3 años de edad, es emprendedora y muy sociable. Desde hace mas de 5 años se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo, el proceso de la venta lo realiza de puerta en puerta. Ella necesita el préstamo para comprar mercadería específicamente ropa para dama, caballero y niños. Por el buen trato que tiene con sus clientes, ella ya tiene asegurado una parte de sus ventas lo que le representa una ventaja sobre su competencia. Su sueño es poder tener su propio local comercial donde pueda vender variedad de diseños de ropa, además de velar por la educación de sus hijos a quien tanto quiere.
texts.en: Maribel, 32, is married with 2 children aged 8 and 3 years old. She is very enterprising and sociable. For over 5 years, she has been selling clothing from catalogs. She carries out her sales process by going door-to-door. She needs a loan to buy merchandise, specifically clothing for women, men, and children. She has already secured a portion of her sales in a deal with her customers so she has an advantage over the competition. Her dream is to have her own shop where she could sell a variety of clothing designs in addition to ensuring the education of her children that she loves very much.

loans.use: to purchase clothing to sell.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Doña Marta es una mujer de 35 años de edad luchadora y emprendedora quien se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol desde hace muchos años actividad que aprendió gracias a sus padres quienes supieron instruirla en dicho rubro pasando sus conocimientos para que ella también trabajara en un futuro si ella así lo decidía. Junto a su compañero de hogar trabajan diariamente para generar ingresos para el sustento de su familia. Ella agradece mucho a sus padres por haberle apoyado en sus estudios para que culminara su primera fase que es la primaria en donde aprendió a leer y escribir. Sus cultivos están ubicados a un kilómetro de su casa de habitación al cual se traslada diariamente caminando para dar asistencia y mantenimiento permitiendo esto estar más al cuidado de los mismos para evitar las aves, gusanos entre otros involucrándose junto a ella solo su compañero de hogar.    
Doña Marta ha solicitado financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abonos, fertilizantes y semilla de maíz y frijol certificada para poder sembrar en su propiedad. Sus planes y sueños a futuro lograr graduar su hijo para que sea una persona prospera en la vida y con un mayor conocimiento para poder adaptarse en cualquier ámbito laboral y social. Para con sus cultivos lograr asistirlos para que no sean dañados por plagas y pierda la cosecha que con mucho empeño, esfuerzo y sacrificio ha trabajado en compañía de su conyugue.
texts.en:
Marta, 35, is a hardworking entrepreneur who dedicates herself to the cultivation of corn and beans, work she has done for many years. She learned to farm from her parents who knew how to teach her these skills. They passed their knowledge down so that she would also work as a farmer in the future is she chose to do so. Together with her partner, she works daily to generate income to support her family. She is very grateful to her parents for having supported her studies in primary school where she learned to read and write. Her crops are located within a mile of her house. She has a daily walking commute to support and maintain her crops, avoiding birds, worms, and other pests. She works with her partner.

Marta has requested funding from COMIXMUL to purchase agricultural inputs such as fertilizer, manure, and certified seed for planting corn and beans on her property.They will work to achieve a harvest that are not damaged by pests. She does not want to lose their crop and waste so much effort and sacrifice that she and her partner have put into their crops. Her plans and dreams are to have her child graduate from school and be a person who thrives in life, with greater insight to adapt and work in any social setting.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural inputs and seeds to plant corn and beans.

loans.name: Ketavan

texts.en:
Ketevan is a 23-year-old young woman living in the village of Kvabla, Georgia.  She lives with her infant and her husband, who is temporarily unemployed.  Sadly, due to a lack of economic resources, and because she had to start working at a very young age, Ketevan was unable to study for a professional career.  She is a hard worker who puts a lot of effort in to helping her family earn their living and cover the family's increasing needs.  

Ketevan earns a small income working on family-owned agricultural land growing maize and nuts, as well as caring for milked-cows and cattle.  She decided to start a more stable activity because the family only has seasonal income.  Ketevan has requested a loan to open a grocery store near her home and for working capital.  All of the financial institutions rejected her loan requests because of her unstable financial condition and lack of experience.  Her request was approved under the framework of the Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, permitting the rural poor to start or re-start businesses. 

A loan of 3,000 GEL will help Ketevan to purchase goods.  This credit will be a great support for the family.  Ketevan is thankful to Kiva's lenders for giving her a chance to generate income.

loans.use: to open a grocery store and have money for working capital.

loans.name: Luz Ángela

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer carismática, entregada a su familia y apasionada por su labor, pues desde hace 2 años se desempeña como madre comunitaria con el apoyo del Bienestar Familiar, la labor la inició como alternativa para generar ingresos sin descuidar a sus hijos, así logra apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y el sustento de sus dos pequeños hijos de 4 y 10 años.
Se motiva a solicitar el crédito como apoyo para fortalecer su negocio, pues cancelará el saldo de un crédito que tiene vigente y realizará unas adecuaciones al espacio de trabajo como pintar las paredes y asegurar algunas zonas para el bienestar de los niños, esto le permitirá brindar mejor servicio y tranquilidad a los padres de los pequeños que cuida, así podrá mejorar los ingresos familiares.
Luz manifiesta que su mayor propósito es seguir trabajando arduamente para lograr pagar completamente su casa y así brindar mejor calidad de vida y bienestar a su todo su grupo familiar.
texts.en:
Luz is a charismatic person, dedicated to her family, and passionate about her work. For 2 years she has been working as a community mother with the support of Bienestar Familiar [Family Wellbeing]. She began this work as an alternative to earn income that would still allow her to take care of her children. In this way, she is able to help her husband with the household economy and support her two small children, who are 4 and 10 years old.

She is requesting the loan in order to strengthen her business. She will pay a loan that she has and will make improvements to her work space, such as painting the walls and making some spaces safer for children. This will allow her to provide better service and peace of mind for the parents of the small children she cares for. This will help her improve her family’s income.

Luz explains that her main goal is to continue working hard so she can pay off her house loan completely and then provide a better quality of life and wellbeing for her whole family.

loans.use: to pay a loan that she has and to make improvements to her work space, such as painting the walls and making some spaces safer for children.

loans.name: Manchesta Group

texts.en:
Melina is a mother of four children, two girls and two boys, who are in school.  She is in her early forties.  For three years now, Melina has made her life by selling firewood.  She owns a big store at her home where she keeps her stock.  She operates her business on an on demand basis, selling firewood whenever a customer demands.  Melina is able to make a small monthly profit. 

This is Melina's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she will use to buy firewood stock to meet customer demand.  She dreams that one day she will be ale to open another successful business.  She will share this loan with her loan group Manchesta, which totals eight members.  The members of the group will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan.

loans.use: to buy firewood stock to meet customer demand.

loans.name: María Lastenia

texts.es:
María, a sus 40 años de edad, es madre soltera de 7 hijos, por quienes ha luchado arduamente para sacarlos adelante.
Desde hace aproximadamente 7 años trabaja como comerciante independiente, vendiendo comidas rápidas en un carro de comidas que compró de segunda mano, su jornada de trabajo es de jueves a domingo de 4 a 11 pm, ya que los demás días de la semana se dedica a trabajar como empleada doméstica en diferentes casas de familia de la región, así logra complementar los ingresos para dar educación, alimento y vestido a sus hijos.
Con el fin de fortalecer su negocio, solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar otro carro de comidas en mejor estado, utensilios de cocina y los insumos necesarios (panes, carnes frías, salsas, gaseosas), esto le permitirá mejorar las condiciones de trabajo y aumentar las ventas, pues los activos que posee actualmente, ya están bastante deteriorados y en mal estado lo que genera una imagen negativa en los comensales.
María sueña con tener su negocio en un local propio, en el que pueda seguir prestando un servicio y productos de excelente calidad, posicionarse más en el mercado y lograr una mayor rentabilidad para dar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
María is 40 years old and the single mother of 7 children for whom she has struggled fiercely to get them ahead. She has been working for about 7 years as an independent business person selling fast food from a food cart that she bought second-hand. Her work day is from 4 pm to 11 pm, Thursday to Sunday.  The other days she works as a domestic in different houses in the area. In this way she earns the revenues needed to educate, cloth and feed her children. 

With the aim of strengthening her business she is requesting a loan to buy another food cart in better condition, cooking utensils and the necessary supplies (breads, cold cuts, sauces, soft drinks). This will allow her to improve her working conditions and increase her sales as the tools she has now are in poor shape and give a poor impression to her customers. María dreams of having a her own shop where she could provide better service and high quality products. She wants to position herself better in the market and generate more profit to provide her children with a higher quality of life and well-being.

loans.use: to buy another food cart in better condition, cooking utensils and necessary ingredients (bread, cold cuts, sauces and soft drinks).

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more dry fish and others foodstuff for her business.

loans.name: Abida

texts.en: Abida is a 50-year-old married woman.  She lives with her husband in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of one daughter and four sons. She does embroidery work by hand at her home and she financially supports her family. She belongs to a poor family.  Her husband’s income is very poor so she decided to start embroidery work at home. She learned this art from her childhood and now she has adopted it for her occupation.  She has enabled herself to be independent and earn a sufficient income. She requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, to purchase stock of threads, silk, fancy sequins and pearls of various colours. She hopes that this loan will prove beneficial for her and for her family.  Abida is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy raw materials for embroidery.

loans.name: María Elizabeth

texts.es:
María tiene 23 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está casada y su esposo es soldado desde hace 7 años, tiene 2 hijos de 1 y 5 años de edad y solo ellos 4 conforman esta familia.

María se dedica a los oficios domésticos y al cuido de sus hijos, los ingresos provienen de su esposo que es soldado y debido a que él por su trabajo la mayoría de tiempo está fuera de casa ella no puede trabajar fijamente porque se dedica al cuido de sus hijos.

El crédito lo utilizará para mejorar la vivienda, en primer lugar instalar la energía eléctrica, que no poseen, comprarán un poste metálico, cables, poliducto, rosetas, caja térmica entre otras materiales que necesitarán para la instalación, además cancelarán la mano de obra y el derecho de conexión a la red eléctrica.

Dentro de sus planes está que su hijo de 5 años comience asistir a la escuela y poder encontrar una fuente de ingresos para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos económicos del hogar.
texts.en:
María is 23 years old, she studied up until 6th grade, is married and her husband has been a solder for 7 years. They have two children aged 1 and 5 and it is only these four members which make up the family.

María spends her time in domestic tasks and looking after their children. The income comes from her husband who is a soldier and due to the fact that he is out of the house most of the time for his work, María cannot take up a fixed job because she looks after their children.

She will use the loan to improve their home, firstly to install electricity which they do not have. They will buy a metal post, cables, pipes, nozzles, an insulation box and other materials that they will need for the installation. In addition, they will pay for the labor and the right to connect to the electricity network.

Within María's plan is the fact that her five-year-old son is starting to attend school, and she will be able to find a source of income to help her husband with the household's expenditure.

loans.use: to buy a metal pole, cables, pipes, nozzle, an insulation box and other materials that they will need to install electricity.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy new stocks for her crafts business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens and accessories for her chicken farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, varnish, glue, nails and other materials.

loans.name: Lilian Anselma

texts.es:
Lilian, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada, su esposo tiene 37 años de edad, poseen dos hijos los cuales están estudiando en la universidad, con el fin de apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de su familia hace cinco años realizo la apertura de una tienda en su casa, trabaja todos los días, le colabora su mamá, hasta la fecha no representa ningún problema.
Solicita un préstamo para incrementar los productos que tiene en su inventario, comprara detergentes, jabón, aceite, pastas, papel higiénico, dulces, galletas, etc., así  tendrá mejores opciones de compra para sus clientes, sus ventas mejoraran y continuara apoyando a su esposo.
Su sueño es mantenerse trabajando en su negocio y que sus hijos finalicen sus carreras.
texts.en:
Lilian, age 33, is married, and her husband is 37 years old.  They have two children who are attending the university.  Five years ago she opened a store at her house in order to help her husband with the family expenses.  She works every day, and her mother works with her.  So far she has not had any problem.

She is requesting a loan in order to increase the products that she has in her inventory.  She will buy detergent, soap, cooking oil, pasta, toilet paper, candy, and cookies, etc.  This way she will have better buying options for her customers.  Her sales will improve, and she will continue helping her husband.

Her dream is to keep working in her business and for her children to finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy detergent, soap, cooking oil, pasta, toilet paper, candy, and cookies, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, coal, and oil for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy four bags of fertilizer and five bags of potatoes

loans.name: Yogi

texts.en:
Yogi lives in west Bandung, about 3 hours from Jakarta. Yogi manages a small shop selling snacks, drinks and mobile phone airtime credit. Yogi is married and lives with four persons in his family home.

Yogi joined Ruma 1 month ago because he became interested in selling mobile phone airtime credits. With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Yogi has seen improvements in his shop. For the last month, he earned an average of $30 in mobile phone airtime credit sales. He hopes to get a Kiva loan for working capital to process more transactions. His goal is to open more new businesses in the future.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions

loans.name: Jose Heriberto

texts.es:
José Heriberto tiene 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El tiene una bodeguita donde ofrece venta de abarrotes, como leche, aceite, arroz, azúcar, gaseosa, art. de aseo, desde hace 10 años, José ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de abarrotes para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
José Heriberto, age 57, lives with his wife and son in the Oyotún district.  It is a community dedicated to agriculture, commerce, and livestock.  It is located in the Chiclayo Province in the Lambayeque Región on the northern coast of Peru.

He has a little store where he has been selling groceries like milk, cooking oil, rice, sugar, soft drinks, and personal hygiene items for ten years.

José has requested a loan for 1,000 soles to buy a variety of groceries to offer his customers.  This way he will make his business grow.

loans.use: to buy a variety of groceries to offer his customers.

loans.name: Reyes

texts.es:
Reyes tiene 52 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad con clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región, Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de piña desde hace 25 años, su esposa le apoya en esta labor preparando los alimentos para los jornaleros que dan mantenimiento a su cultivo, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para el pago de mano de obra del cultivo de piña.
texts.en:
Reyes, age 52, lives with his wife and children in the Pucará district.  It is a community with a warm climate, and the people there work in agriculture, commerce, and with livestock.  It is located in the Jaén Province in the Cajamarca Región in the northern highlands of Peru.

He has devoted himself to agriculture, especially growing pineapples, for 25 years.  His wife helps him in this work by preparing food for the day workers who perform maintenance on his crops.  He has requested a loan for 1,500 soles to pay for the labor on his pineapple crops.

loans.use: to pay for the labor on his pineapple crops.

loans.name: Ingrid Yurleni

texts.es:
En una parte de la ciudad se encontraba una chica llamada  Ingrid Yurleni que quería estudiar en un instituto lo que a ella más le apasiona en la vida "Cosmetología Integral", ella compartió este secreto con el amigo, quien le aconsejo el Instituto  Campo Alto por el buen desempeño en aprendizaje, que se enfoca más en forma un ser integral  que un profesional, a Yurleni le quedo sonando la idea de ir al dichoso instituto, el cual sabía que llenaría las expectativas a nivel laboral, para sacar a los hermanos adelante, ya que ellos son más pequeños que ella.
Ingrid sabe que no puede contar con el apoyo de la madre ya que ella tiene a cargo la responsabilidad de los hermanos, al ver esta desconcertante situación ella se pone a trabajar para pagarse los estudios, materiales o  implemento, los cuales son solicitados para ejercer esta profesión,  con el apoyo del padre si que menos puede contar, ya que el nunca se a tomado la delicadeza de saber si los hijos necesitan algo o de ser responsable de ellos. 
Ingrid toma la alternativa de matricularse con la certeza de que podrá demostrarles a los familiares que cuando alguien  quiere un propósito para la vida si se puede cumplir, todo es de tomar la decisión, por ello Ingrid solicita el subsidio con kiva  para poder estudiar y poder ejercer el sueño de ser cosmetóloga, Ya que se encuentra afortunada de encontrar Instructores y  educadores con un gran querer y poder de hacer que este mundo sea mejor, ella quiere ser una de esas personas que tenga esa oportunidad, en lo personal  también  ser una ejemplo para los hermanos, que se den cuenta que quizás no pueden haber entradas económicas, pero si de una persona que quiere salir  adelante para que  los sueños se hagan realidad.
Para que de esta manera pueda Ingrid adquirir más conocimientos en el mundo laboral de los compañeros de trabajo aprender mutuamente y personal, quiere ayudar a los hermanos  y piensa ofrecerles estudio, para que a ellos también se les hagan realidad los propósitos y sueños, con la madre ofrecerle una vejes digna llena de amor y disfrutar los triunfos con la mujer que le dio la vida.
texts.en: In one part of the city there is a young woman named Ingrid Yurleni, who would like to study the one thing that she is most passionate about: complete cosmetology.  She shared this secret with a friend, who recommended the Instituto Campo Alto for its good performance and learning, which focuses more on teaching the whole person than the professional.  Yurleni liked the idea of attending this institution, which she knows will give her many employment opportunities that will help her to raise her younger siblings.  Ingrid knows that she cannot count on her mother for help, because she has the responsibility of caring for her siblings.  Faced by this disconcerting situation, she began working to pay for her studies, and the materials and tools that are required in the profession.  She can count even less on her father for support, as he has never taken the trouble to find out whether his children needed anything or taken any responsibility for them. Ingrid has decided to graduate, with the certainty that she can show her family that when someone has a goal in life it can be achieved; the only thing necessary is to make the decision.  For this reason Ingrid is requesting a loan from Kiva, in order to study and to achieve her dream of being a cosmetologist.  She has been lucky to find instructors and educators with a great desire and ability to make the world better, and she would like to become one of these people.  On a personal level, she would like to be an example for her siblings, so that they realize that although they might not have much income, if someone wants to get ahead dreams can become reality.  Ingrid hopes to acquire knowledge in the working world, learning mutually from her co-workers and also on a personal level. She would like to help her siblings, and is thinking about helping them to study, so that they too can make their goals and dreams become reality.  She would also like to provide her mother with a life full of love, sharing her triumphs with the woman who gave her life.

loans.use: to pay tuition for one semester.

loans.name: Majedan

texts.en: Majedan is a 52-year-old married woman living with her family in Lahore, Pakistan. Her son is a confectioner by profession; he owns a bakery in their town. He sells sweets such as laddu, barfi, gulabjamun, rus gullay, etc. Majedan's husband had run the bakery, but his son took over when he retired and is currently looking after all the bakery's affairs. He has been purchasing all the inventory in large quantities from a nearby bakery and selling it from his own bakery. Now he wants to prepare all the sweets by himself, but he does not have basic ingredients for making sweets. He is in need of an oven for making sweets. Due to lack of funds, he is unable to buy raw materials for making sweets. Therefore, Majedan has requested a loan so that her son can buy the necessary items for making sweets to sell. She thanks to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and an oven for making sweets

loans.name: Nana

texts.en: Nana is 38-year-old woman who lives with her husband in the village of Tsilkani, in Mtskheta district. Her husband works as a driver at a construction company and generates 400 GEL monthly. As it becomes harder to support their family on this income, Nana decided to start her own business. She sells men's and women's clothing and linens. She couldn't receive a loan from the local financial institutions because of their requirements to have business experience or stable revenue. She is taking this loan through the Start Up program, which is a joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The program allows the rural poor, like Nana, a chance to start or re-start a business. Nana requested a loan of 700 GEL to purchase products at wholesale prices and then resell them among her friends and villagers. This will give her a chance to earn income and become financially independent. Thanks to the Start Up program, Nana will be able to save some money and provide a better future for her family.

loans.use: To start a business selling clothing and linens

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay off a debt she has with Credicampo.

loans.name: Zahida's Group

texts.en:
Zahida is 45 years old, married, and has five children. Her husband is very hard working and honest; he owns a small restaurant in which he offers different types of delicious foods. His customers bring the meals through parcel and suggested to him that he offer milk because there is no milk shop near. 

As per his customers' demand, Zahida's husband wants to offer milk but he does not have enough cash in hand to buy milk to sell. Therefore, Zahida requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can buy milk to sell in his restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase milk for her husband's restaurant.

loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es:
Doña María Ángela es una mujer luchadora de 42 años de edad, madre soltera de 2 hijos siendo ellos su único apoyo en las diferentes actividades de campo entre otras que son llevadas a cabo en el hogar. Ella es agricultora y también se dedica al comercio ya que en su casa de habitación tiene una pequeña pulpería y por otro lado se dedica también al cultivo y siembra de maíz y frijol actividad que aprendió a temprana edad en compañía de sus padres el cual es comercializado en su pequeño negocio y con los compradores que llegan a la zona. Ella tiene mucha experiencia ya que tiene más de 20 años de dedicarse al cultivo de granos básicos siendo este uno de sus ingresos para el sustento de su hogar ya que el otro es su pequeña pulperia. El terreno en el cual ella y sus hijos viven es propio ya que gracias a una herencia que sus padres le dieron pudieron aprovechar para construir, aperturar su pulperia y para sembrar.
Actualmente ella solicita ayuda para la compra de semilla de primera calidad y los insumos necesarios que ayudaran a que el cultivo de granos básicos pueda estar fortalecido y muy bien cuidado mediante la aplicación de estos. Sus metas poder cosechar la semilla que comprara, para poder generar mayores ingresos a su familia, surtir un poco más su pequeña pulperia para ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor y mayor variedad ya que ella tiene muchas esperanzas de ser apoyada por los diferentes inversionistas en la plataforma Kiva para llevar a cabo sus metas. Sus sueños poder formar una caja rural que ayude a contribuir entre los vecinos la ayuda para cuando ellos soliciten de esta clase de financiamientos.
texts.en:
María Ángela is a hardworking woman of 42 years old: a single mother to two children who are her only support in the different field activities among others that are carried out in the household. She is a farmer, and she also works in sales as it is in her home that she has a small juice bar and she also works sowing and harvesting corns and beans - an activity which she learned at a young age in the company of her parents. These products are sold in her small store and to the buyers who come to the area. 

María Ángela has a lot of experience as she has been working for more than 20 years growing bulk grains as this is one of her sources of income to support her household, with the other being the juice bar. The land in which she and her children live is her own as it was thanks to an inheritance that her parents gave her that they were able to benefit from building and opening the juice bar and sowing crops.

María Ángela is now seeking help to buy high quality seeds and the supplies needed to help her ensure that the crop of bulk grains is strong and well-cared for when the goods are applied. Her aims are to harvest the seeds that she will build, in order to generate more income for her family, to stock a little more in her juice bar to offer her customers a wider and better variety of products as she has placed a lot of hope in being supported by the different investors in the Kiva platform to achieve her goals. She dreams of setting up a rural cooperative that helps contribute among neighbors the help should they require this type of financing.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and high quality corn seeds for cultivation.

loans.name: Olinda

texts.es:
Doña Olinda tiene 46 años de edad, madre de un hijo quien ayuda en casa en los diferentes oficios del hogar y del campo junto a su padre. Ella es ama de casa y agricultora con mucha experiencia en el trabajo de campo cosechando maíz, frijol y maicillo siendo sus padres quienes le enseñaran a temprana edad dependiendo los ingresos para su familia de este rubro. Cuenta con un grado de educación de primaria incompleto el cual no pudo terminar por la falta de apoyo económico por sus padres. En compañía de su conyugue y su hijo se dirigen diariamente a su propiedad para poder limpiarla, darle el mantenimiento necesario para evitar se llene de maleza el cual está ubicado a 100 metros de su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan caminando. 
Ella ha solicitado un financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para poder comprar insumos agrícolas como semilla de maíz y frijoles certificada, abono, fertilizantes que darán una protección a sus cultivos de plagas y ayudaran al desarrollo y crecimiento de los mismos. Sus sueños dar a su hijo una buena educación verlo crecer como persona y como profesional ya que es lo menos que él se merece. Sus metas son las de poder dar una excelente asistencia a sus cultivos de maíz y frijol para obtener una buena cosecha y seguir formando y fortaleciendo poco a poco el patrimonio para su hijo.
texts.en:
Olinda is 46 years old. She is the mother of one son who helps around the house and in the field alongside his father. She is a homemaker and a farmer with a lot of experience in the fields, harvesting corn, beans, and sorghum. Her parents taught her from an early age, since the family’s income depended on this business. She went to school for part of first grade, but couldn’t finish due to a lack of financial support from her parents. She and her husband and her son go each day to their farm to weed it and maintain it so that it doesn’t get full of weeds. It is located 100 meters from their house and they get there by walking. 

She has requested a loan from COMIXMUL in order to buy agricultural inputs such as certified corn and bean seeds, manure, and fertilizers that will protect her crops from insects and aid in their growth. Her dream is to give her son a good education and see him grow as a person and as a professional, since this is the least he deserves. Her goals are to provide excellent care to her crops of corn and beans so that she can have a good harvest, and to continue building, little by little, a future for her son.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs and certified corn and bean seeds for planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make payments on her motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Jose Rudy Agapito

texts.es:
José, opta por un nuevo crédito para pagar mano de obra para sembrar su cultivo y compra de insecticidas, plaguicidas, herbicidas, abono, para preparar el terreno.
El capital que se le facilito anteriormente lo utilizo para pagar los costos de la recoleccion de la cosecha lo que le acorto el tiempo para llevarlo hacia su casa.
texts.en:
José has decided to take a new loan to pay for labor to plant his crop and to buy insecticides, pesticides, herbicides, and manure to prepare his land.

The loan that he had previously was used to pay for the costs of harvesting the crop, which shortened the time it took to get it to his house.

loans.use: to pay for labor to plant his crop and to buy insecticides, pesticides, herbicides, and manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, rice, and cooking seasonings to sell

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 37 years old and lives in Stepanavan city in the Lori region. She is married and has two daughters and a son. Maria’s husband is constructer. She has vocational education and a specialty of accounting. For many years now, Maria has worked at the school as an accountant. At the same time, with the help of her husband, she is engaged in farming and agriculture. In her cute farm she has a cow, a heifer and ten chickens. On her plot of land she cultivates mainly potatoes, which she sells mostly at the city wholesale market. From her farm she also sells eggs and milk.

Maria asks for a loan of 300,000 Armenian drams, since she wants to buy a new sort of potato seedling with great hopes of having a better potato harvest in the coming season.

loans.use: to buy a new sort of potato seedling with great hopes of having a better potato harvest in the coming season.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Mariano tiene 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Querocotillo, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de café y maíz, también se dedican al comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la ganadería, comprando y vendiendo ganado vacuno lechero desde hace tres años, su esposa le apoya en esta labor ordeñando las vacas y procesando la leche fresca para venderlo mediante quesillos y quesos, para ofrecerlo a sus clientes.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para mayor producción de leche fresca y de esta manera producir mayor cantidad de productos lácteos.
texts.en:
Mariano is 43 years old; he lives together with his wife and children in the district of Querocotillo, a community who makes his living in agriculture, and in particular growing coffee and corn. He also works in sales and cattle, located in the province of Cutervo which belongs to the region of Cajamarca, a sierra in the north of Peru.

He has been working in the cattle industry, buying and selling dairy cattle for the last three years, his wife supports him in this task, milking the cows and processing the fresh milk to sell in the form of soft cheese and cheeses for sale to his customers.

Mariano has sought a loan of 1,500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles to buy animal feed to ensure a larger production of fresh milk and in this way produce a larger quantity of dairy production.

loans.use: to buy animal feed to produce fresh milk.

loans.name: Liz Katherine

texts.es:
Liz Katherine tiene 34 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral patos, cuyes, conejos en la aprte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de conejos y alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Liz Katherine is 34 years and lives with her husband and children in the district of Oyotún, a community which revolves around agriculture, commerce and cattle that is located in the province of Chiclayo which belongs to the region of Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Peru.

She makes her living rearing and selling farmyard animals: ducks, guinea pigs and rabbits in the rear part of her home. She is seeking a loan of 1,500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles to buy rabbits and animal feed to fatten her animals and in this manner generate a larger income for her family.

loans.use: to buy animal feed to fatten animals.

loans.name: Arsen

texts.en:
Arsen is 44 years old, married, and has three children. He lives in the village Achajur in Tavush region. Arsen and his wife are engaged in swine breeding and fruit gardening. For four to five months, he also goes to Russian Federation and does different constructional work to earn additional money.  

In his farm Arsen has two pigs, 30 chickens, and a large beautiful vineyard. In autumn, which is high time of grape purveyance, his vineyard always ensures a good yield, since he does not skimp on finances or effort just to have a harvest of the best quality. 

Arsen requested a loan from Nor Horizon for 500,000 Armenian drams, which he will use to purchase five pigs and animal fodder for all his cattle.  He also wants to add to his fruit gardening, which will increase his income.

loans.use: to purchase five pigs and animal fodder

loans.name: Abida

texts.en: Abida is 42 years old. She is a responsible mother of five children. She is a housewife and looks after her family, which is comprised of seven persons. Abida is well trained in cloth stitching. She provides stitching services to people at her own house. She needs to purchase a sewing machine and a variety of stitching materials for her work, including thread, needles, and cloth. This is very important for Abida to continue her work efficiently and professionally. However, due to a lack of money, she finds it difficult and requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. BRAC Pakistan issued her loan, as she requested. Abida is very thankful to Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine and stitching materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal and wood

loans.name: Zoila María

texts.es: Zoila, es una mujer de 41 años de edad, responsable, alegre y muy trabajadora,  vive en Tulcán, es madre soltera, tiene una niña de 2 años de edad. Ella se dedica al cultivo de papa, esta actividad ya la viene desarrollando desde hace 20 años atrás. Previamente ya solicito un préstamo a FODEMI con el cual invirtió en el cultivo que tenia. Ahora ella piensa iniciar un nuevo cultivo por lo que necesita el préstamo para comprar abonos y semilla para cultivar papa, a pesar de que tiene competencia, le ha estado yendo bien debido a su buen trato con los clientes que le compran los quintales de papa. Su plan a futuro es comprarse un lote de terreno donde pueda construir su propia casa, además de que cuando su hija crezca enviarla a la escuela.
texts.en: Zoila is 41 years old. She is responsible, cheerful, and very hardworking. She lives in Tulcán. She is a single mother with a 2 year old daughter. She farms potatoes and has been in this business for 20 years. She previously requested a loan from FODEMI, which she invested in the crop she had then. Now she is planning to plant a new crop, so she needs the loan to buy manure and seed potatoes. Though she has competition, things have been going very well for her due to her good interactions with the customers that buy her 100-pound sacks of potatoes. Her plan for the future is to buy a piece of land where she can build her own house. Also, when her daughter grows, she will send her to school.

loans.use: to buy manure and seed potatoes for planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish in bulk.

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine is 36 years old and lives in the Agarak village in the Lori region of Armenia.  She is married and has two school-aged sons.  Even though Marine and her husband are both engaged in farming, he also travels to the Russian Federation to work abroad to try to somehow improve and upgrade his family’s living conditions.  

This peasant family has a cute farm and income from their activities.  On their farm they have a cow, a heifer, and ten sheep.  From her farm Marine sells meat and milk.  On her plot of land Marine cultivates some vegetables (tomatoes, carrots, greens, garlic, and onion) which she sells at the local wholesale food market.  All of their great efforts to earn more money turned out to be too little to provide quality living conditions for their sons, and care for their farm and plot of land, which periodically needs fertilizer and seedlings of better sorts and quality. 

Marine requests a loan of 300,000 AMD in order to buy tomato and cucumber seedlings, as well as animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy tomato and cucumber seedlings, and animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en:
Gayane is 41 years old, divorced, and has two adult children. She lives in Vanadzor city in Lori region. Her mother is the only person, who helped her to overcome all her hardships and encouraged her not to lose the hope of providing better living conditions for her children.  Both her son and her daughter work as tailors at the garment factory and both of them are leading specialists. 

Gayane now she works at a beauty salon as a manager and hairdresser. She is very worried since her daughter is going to be engaged, but she has not enough saved money to organize an engagement party in a way that it will be very nice and unbelievable day for her daughter and her fiancé. Gayane requested a loan for 600,000 Armenian drams, which she will use to organize her daughter’s engagement party and to buy nice presents for her daughter.

loans.use: to organize her daughter’s engagement party and to buy nice presents for her daughter

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil, charcoal, and gari

loans.name: Morayma Noemi

texts.es:
Morayma Noemí tiene 27 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre, que pertenece a la Provincia de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida, tamales, cecina entre otros preparos desde hace 2 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de una nueva parrilla más grande y de esta manera abastecer a su clientela.
texts.en:
Morayma Noemí is 27 years old, she lives together with her husband and children in the district of Morropon, a community which works in agriculture, commerce and cattle, located in the province of the same name which belongs to the department of Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

Morayma Noemí has been making her living selling food: tamales, jerked meat and other dishes for the last 2 years. Her business is located in the rear part of her home. She has sought a loan of 1,500 Peruvian Nuevos Soles for the purchase of a new larger parrilla and in this manner supplier her customers.

loans.use: to buy a large parrilla to prepare her food.

loans.name: Tanvena

texts.en: Tanvena, 35, deals in the business of animal sales. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase two more calves. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase two more calves.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks, purified water and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
Marcos de 35 años de edad, no tuvo oportunidad de estudiar esta acompañado su compañera de vida es ama de casa, tienen 3 niños el mayor tienen 11 años estudia quinto grado, el segundo estudia primer grado,  el menor de 2 años y medio. Marcos es un agricultor que siembra sandia y maíz desde hace 6 años ya que en la zona es el cultivo que se siembra; porque les queda un poco más de ganancia, su lugar de trabajo está a una distancia de 2 km en horario de 6 a 11 de la mañana.

Necesita el crédito para comprar semilla de sandía fertilizantes, pesticidas y herbicidas para realizar su cultivo de sandía. Podrá tener una cosecha mejor y obtener mayor ganancia y poder comprar lo necesario en el hogar.

Sueña que su cultivo y tenga una buena plantación sacar buena cosecha y con las ganancias obtenidas poder cultivar su milpa, él quiere que sus niños estudien sean unos profesionales y puedan tener una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Marcos, 35, didn’t have the opportunity to study. He has a life partner who is a homemaker and they have 3 children, the eldest is 11 and studies in the fifth grade, the second child is in first grade and the youngest child is 2 1/2 years old. Marcos is a farmer and has been growing watermelon and corn for 6 years because that is the crop that is sown in the area, and it provides a bit more income. His workplace is 2km from his house and he works from 6-11 in the morning.

He needs this loan to purchase watermelon seeds, fertilizer, pesticide and herbicide to cultivate his watermelon crop. He could have a better harvest, obtain better income and purchase the necessities for his house.

He dreams that his crop is well-planted, has a good harvest and with the income he can have his own cornfield. He wants his children to study and become professionals and have a good life.

loans.use: to purchase watermelon seeds, fertilizer, pesticide and herbicide to cultivate his watermelon crop.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en:
Shabana is 42 years old, married, and has two children. She operates a business selling milk. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread earner. With the passage of time her sales and income increased. Now Shabana has four buffaloes, which happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. 

Shabana has some savings and requested her fourth loan for 40,000 PRK, which she will use to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en:
Robina, 43, is a married woman who makes shoe uppers. She supplies these uppers to different factories where they are used in making shoes.

Robina has applied a loan of 45,000 PKR through Kashf Foundation. With the loan investment, she will buy leather, spools of thread, and needles that will allow her to make shoe uppers in larger quantities and improve the business. She is very experienced in her business and is confident that her business will move in a positive direction as a result of loan investment. She is in her 6th loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy leather, spools of thread, and needles.

loans.name: Saleema

texts.en:
Saleema is a 33-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband (also shown in the photo) at the corner of her house. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market and dealing with customers by sitting at the shop.

Over the time they have become popular in their community for providing good quality products and make enough to meet their household expenses. Currently, she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand at their store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials to make clothing such as fabrics, threads, needles, buttons, lace, elastics, among others.

loans.name: Lidia Lissette

texts.es:
Lidia, tiene un negocio en el que sus clientes han aumentado por el buen servicio y variedad de platillos que ofrece, el crédito anterior le ayudo a tener los recursos económicos para adquirir todos los ingredientes necesarios para mantenerse en el mercado.
En esta oportunidad solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar arroz, aceite, carnes, pollo, embutidos, verduras, bebidas, etc.,  y así satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes.
texts.en: Lidia has a business in which her customer base has increased through the good service and variety of dishes that he offers, the previous loan helped her to have the financial resources to acquire all the ingredients needed to keep her in the market. On this occasion, Lidia is seeking a new loan to buy rice, oil, meat, chicken, sausages, vegetables, drinks and so on to therein satisfy her customers' tastes.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, meat, chicken, sausages, vegetables, drinks and so on.

loans.name: Teresa Evilia

texts.es:
Teresa de 66 años de edad, estudio hasta sexto grado en la comunidad cercana donde se creció con sus otros cuatro hermanos, siendo la tercera de la familia.
Vive con su hermano, donde los crecieron sus padres, ella vivio por mucho tiempo en la capital del país, donde trabajo por muchos años y fue ahí donde aprendió sastrería. Gracias a que aprendió y logro obtener un diplomado de sastrería, trabaja en la casa de habitación.
Antes ella solo trabajo en la capital en casa, haciendo los oficios domésticos y con su familia trabajo en los cultivos de maíz y frijoles.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para terminar de construir una habitación que esta en proceso de construcción, gracias a su esfuerzo, necesita comprar, cemento, arena, hierro y teja en lo cual tiene previsto terminar las partes principales de su habitación.
Con ello, tendrá ya para si misma su propia habitación donde vivir, ya que durante casi toda su vida ha vivido con su hermano menor.

El sueño de Teresa es terminar de construir su vivienda por completo, para ello planea ir haciendo por partes, cuando cancele su crédito solicitara un nuevo crédito, para ponerle ladrillo en el piso de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Teresa is 66 years old. She studied until sixth grade in the community close by, where she grew up with her other four brothers as the third child in the family. Teresa lives with her brother, where her parents grew up. She lived in the nation's capital for a long time where she worked for many years. It was there she learned to be a tailor. Thanks to what she learned and achieving a certification in tailoring, she works in her home. Before, Teresa only worked at home in the capital doing domestic services. With her family, she worked in farming corn and beans. 

The loan that Teresa is requesting is to finish building a room that is in the process of construction, thanks to her effort. She needs to buy cement, sand, iron and tile with which she anticipates she can finish the main parts of her home. With that, she will now have for herself her own house to live in, seeing as for almost her whole life she has lived with her younger brother. 

Teresa's dream is to completely finish building her home. In order to do that she is planning on doing it part by part. When she repays her loan, she will request a new one in order to put brick on the floor of the house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron and tile with which she anticipates she will finish the main parts of her house.

loans.name: Rosa Amanda

texts.es: Amanda, es una mujer  amable, paciente y responsable, tiene 24 años de edad, vive en Tulcán, es madre soltera, tiene 2 niñas de 5 y 3 años de edad, su niña de 5 años asiste a la escuela. Hace un año atrás, por la necesidad de generar ingresos para su hogar decidió ponerse una tienda de víveres, ya que en la zona donde vive no existía ninguna cerca, sus vecinos y ella tenían que caminar largos trayectos para encontrar una tienda, por esto en su negocio le ha estado yendo muy bien debido a estar localizada en un punto estratégico en el barrio donde vive. Ella necesita el préstamo para abastecerse de víveres que necesitan sus clientes como arroz, azúcar, aceite entre otros. Su meta es que su tienda se convierta en un micromercado donde exista variedad de productos y que con los ingresos que este negocio le generé poder educar a sus niñas.
texts.en:
Amanda is a kind, patient and responsible woman. She is 24 years old and lives in Tulcán. She is a single mother and has 2 daughters ages 5 and 3; her 5-year-old daughter attends school. 

She needed to generate an income for her household so a few years ago she decided to put a store in her home because in her area there isn't one that is close. She and her neighbours have to walk far to go to a store and that is why her store has been doing very well because of its strategically located position in her neighbourhood. 

She needs a loan to stock up on provisions for her clients’ need such as rice, sugar, oil and others. Her goal is to have her store become a mini-market where a variety of products are sold and with the income generated from the store she could provide education for her daughters.

loans.use: to stock up on provisions for her clients’ need such as rice, sugar, oil and others

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, pepper, vita etc to resell.

loans.name: Zoila Elena

texts.es: Elena, es una mujer de 41 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive en Tulcán, tiene 3 hijas  de la cuales una ya es casada y tiene su propio hogar, una tiene 19 y asiste a la universidad y una niña de 17 que asiste al colegio, estas 2 últimas viven con ella. Elena se dedica al cultivo de papa, previamente ya solicitó un préstamo a FODEMI con el cual invirtió en la compra de semillas y abono para su cultivo, ahora ella necesita el préstamo para aumentar su producción, de igual forma lo va invertir en semillas y abono para los cultivos que tiene planeado sembrar. Su sueño a futuro es tener su propia bodega donde tenga varios productos para la venta y por su puesto también vender en este local su producto, que en este caso es la papa, además desea que sus hijas sean unas buenas profesionales.
texts.en:
Elena is 41 years old and a single mother. She lives in Tulcán and has three daughters. One of them is already married and has her own household, one is 19 years old and is at university, and one is a 17-year-old girl who is at school. The latter two live with her. 

Elena plants potatoes. She already had an earlier loan with FODEMI which she used to buy seeds and manure for her crop. Now she needs a loan to increase her production. Therefore she will invest it in the purchase of seeds and manure for the crops she intends so grow.

Her dream is to have her own store where she sells various products and, of course, also her own product, which is potatoes. In addition, she wants her daughters to get a good job.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for her potato crop.

loans.name: Rubina

texts.en: Rubina is a 31-year-old woman and is successfully running a small school canteen. She has gained five years of experience in this field and earns enough to meet the needs of the family members. She is a mother of two children and is motivated to provide them with good quality food, clothing and education. She wants to grow her business so she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packs of biscuits, cookies, sweets and beverages to cope with the increasing demand at her canteen. She is in her 3rd loan cycle with a good repayment history. She expects a boost in her earnings and dreams of improving her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy packs of biscuits, cookies, sweets and beverages.

loans.name: Sahiba

texts.en: Sahiba is a 44-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling milk with her husband for many years. She sells milk to the people of her locality. She also works crops to generate an extra amount of profit.  She has become known for providing good-quality milk and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. Currently she is in her third loan cycle and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. Sahiba is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Nusrat

texts.en:
Nusrat is a 35-year-old, vigorous woman. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. 

However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of PKR 40,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of thread in different colors, with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons. The loan will help her to stitch up more dresses on time, to generate a healthier source of income. 

Nusrat is in her fifth loan cycle, with a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors, with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en: Khalida is a 30 year old married woman who has been in the business of selling milk for the past 9 years. She has 5 buffaloes and 3 goats. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to lead her decent life. She has three children. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet day-to-day expenses of life. It’s her 3rd year with Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through support from the foundation. Now she has requested for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase one more cow. In this way she will be able to inflate her sales and profits alongside.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Romana

texts.en: Romana is a 38-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling milk with her husband for many years.  By this time she has attained a good number of customers. She also sells animals on a seasonal basis to generate an extra amount of profit. Romana has become known for providing good-quality milk and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. Currently she is in her third loan cycle and has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. Romana is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Nasreen

texts.en: Nasreen had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future. She began stitching work in her house. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she availed a loan of PKR 40,000 through Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy raw material including cloth, threads of different colors, laces, zippers, etc. to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income. She is currently in her 5th loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy raw material including cloth, threads of different colors, laces, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
Salvador tiene 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace 20 años, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo de 4 500 nuevos soles para la compra de abonos y pago de mano de obra de su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Salvador is 43 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the Callayuc district, a community whose residents make a living in agriculture, commerce, and raising livestock. It is located in the Cutervo province in the Cajamarca region, which is in the northern mountains of Peru.

Salvador has been working in agriculture, in particular growing coffee, for 20 years. His wife assists him with this work. Salvador is requesting a loan of 4,500 soles for the purchase of fertilizer and to pay for labor costs. In this way, he will have a timely harvest to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Muharrem

texts.en:
Muharrem wants to thank all of the lenders for the first loan, which helped him to repair his toilet. He is very grateful for this, as it was a long-standing problem that has finally been resolved. 

Now he is asking for a second loan in order to change the doors and windows of his house. He is very happy to have this opportunity to continue to improve the living conditions of his family and provide a healthier environment for them. 

As he is still working as a driving school instructor, he said that he would never have been able to complete the last renovation or this one without the help of the lenders. He knows that this second loan will just continue to make a more sanitary and healthy living condition for his family. 

Muharrem is grateful to the lenders for both loans and promises to pay on time.

loans.use: to change the doors and windows of his house.

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine is 35 years-old and lives in Vanadzor city in the Lori region. She is married and lives with her husband, son and retired mother-in-law.

Karine has her own clothes trading business. She works at the city wholesale market at a rented stall. Her husband helps her in her business and even drives his car around the villages of the Lori regionselling an assortment of clothes from Karine’s stall. The merchandise of her stall she brings with her husband from Yerevan and once every two months she orders some merchandise from Turkey. As Karine says, her business gives her the opportunity to offer a better quality of life to her family. She has many loyal customers who constantly visit her stall and shop.

Karine has asked for a loan of 1,500 US dollars in order to buy children's festive dresses and to start selling them; she also plans to rent the dresses since among her customers such kind of demand exists.

loans.use: to buy children's festive dresses to sell and rent

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en: Musarat, 52, deals in the business of animal sales. She buys animals (baby goats & calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute in the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase two more calves. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase two more calves.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en: Shahida is a 32-year-old married woman.  For about 10 years she has a business of hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. To help her to continue her operations she has requested for a loan of PKR 40000 to buy reels of thread in different colors and packs of beads, sequins and stones for embellishment of the embroidery. In this way she will be able to cater to more customers. She is hopeful to get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. She dreams for her children's bright future.

loans.use: to buy reels of thread in different colors, packs of beads, sequins and stones.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en: Parveen is 33 years old and a married woman and mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Parveen’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it running. For this reason Parveen has applied for a loan of PKR 40,000, for her husband. He wants to purchase new body for the rickshaw along with new tires. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Parveen is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to purchase a  new auto body along with new tires.

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
Hasmik is 33 years old and lives in Stepanavan city in the Lori region. Hasmik has graduated from Vanadzor State Pedagogical Institute, the faculty of Social Pedagogy. Now she works at the local school as a mentor. She also gives paid private courses of mathematics and geometry. 

Hasmik is so young, but unfortunately being divorced, she takes care of her son alone and solves her child’s financial problems with the help of her parents, with whom she lives now. Her father is a taxi driver, and he also goes to the Russian Federation for work abroad. Hasmik’s mother also is a teacher at the school. In all, the whole family is employed, and all of them want to offer better living conditions for Hasmik’s son. 

Hasmik wants to get more informed and aware of innovations in her specialty and for this, she wants to buy a computer. Because of a great lack of money, she hopes for Kiva support. She asks for a loan of 400,000 Armenian drams to buy a computer and some literature connected with her specialty.

loans.use: to buy a computer and some literature connected with her specialty.

loans.name: Memunatu

texts.en:
Meet 23-year-old Memunatu from Waterloo2, a western, rural area in Freetown. She is married, with one child. 

In 2010, Memunatu established her pharmacy business. She began her business because she wanted to create income for her daily living. She works at the business eight hours per day and six days per week. She says that, at present, her business is doing well.

Memunatu requires a loan in order to buy more medical drugs to sell.  She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to take care of her family's welfare and to increase her business. 

In the future, Memunatu plans to open a big pharmacy shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more medical drugs to sell.

loans.name: Moises Adrian

texts.es:
Moisés, se decidió por otro crédito para invertir en la compra de hierro por mayor para preparar los pedidos de sus clientes, lo que le facilitara acortar el tiempo de entrega y tener buenos ingresos, con los que cancelara las cuotas de la deuda adquirida y cubrirá los gastos familiares.
Con el capital anterior pudo adquirir la materia prima para mantenerse trabajando en la herrería, de esta manera ha mejorado  la economía familiar, tiene más clientes y ha solventado sus deudas.
texts.en:
Moisés has decided to request another loan for the purchase of wholesale iron so he can prepare his customers orders. This will enable him to shorten delivery times and to earn a good income, with which he can pay off the debt he has acquired and cover household expenses.

With the previous loan, he obtained raw materials to keep working at the blacksmith, thus improving his family's finances. He also has more customers and has been paying off his debt.

loans.use: to buy wholesale iron.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil for resale.

loans.name: Salim

texts.en: Salim is living in the Fuzuli region with his family. He is an Internally Displaced Person (IDP) from Fuzuli city, which has been occupied by Armenians for 21 years.  He is 24 years old and not married. Salim rents a store where he sells daily food products. Today he wants to buy a fridge. For this reason Salim needs 1,500 Azerbaijan New Manat. He says he is greatly thankful to the Kiva organization and lenders for the support.

loans.use: to buy a fridge

loans.name: Gelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of ten children, Gelita works hard to support her family. She has a business of selling purified drinking water in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Gelita is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase additional containers of purified drinking water to sell.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Gelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 16 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional containers of purified drinking water to sell.

loans.name: Sarama Group

texts.fr:
Les six femmes du groupe Sarama vivent toutes dans des familles monogamiques. Elles ont en moyenne 32 ans et 3 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le quartier de Missira l’un des quartiers de Ségou (4ème Région administrative de la Républiques du Mali).
Elles se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage, de parenté, mariage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu dans le quartier. Elles font le petit commerce de pagnes, de condiments et des fruits et légumes. Dans le but d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 1er cycle du prêt solidaire.
 Madame Assan  (la deuxième  femme debout de la gauche vers la droite dans la photo) est une grande vendeuse de pagnes (wax, brodés, etc) de tout genre dans le quartier de Missira et ses environnants. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter une 5 pièces de pagnes wax pour ses clients. La vente se fait au comptant et souvent à crédit à une clientèle mixte.
 Madame Assan  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen  de  21 000 FCFA avec ce prêt, qui sera utilisé pour  des petits besoins de ses enfants, aider son mari et augmenter également  son fonds de commerce.
texts.en:
The six members of the Sarama group are all women living in monogamous families. On the average, they are 32 years old, with three children. They all live in Missira, a neighborhood in the town of Segou (the fourth administrative region of Mali).
They know each other as neighbors, relatives by blood or marriage, or through their work as vendors. They sell traditional "pagnes" fabric, condiments, fruits and vegetables. With the goal of bolstering their working capital, the group members have decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their first solidarity loan cycle.

Mrs. Assan (the second one standing from left to right in the photo) is a well-known vendor of traditional fabric (wax, embroidered etc) of all kinds in the Missura neighborhood and nearby. She plans to use her loan to buy five sets of wax pagnes for resale. She sells to a mixed clientele, for cash and often on credit. Mrs. Assan hopes to earn an average monthly revenue of 21,000 West African francs, which will be used to cover some minor expenses for her children, help her husband and also increase her working capital.

loans.use: to buy traditional fabric.

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is 48 years old and he lives in Ijevan city in the Tavush region. He is married and has two daughters and a son. His son works at the factory, his eldest daughter is unemployed, and his youngest daughter is still school-aged. Since 1997, Albert has worked at the Electric Networks as a leading master. Despite Albert and his son being employed, they hardly manage to earn enough for their family living. The family needs are a lot but their finances cover only the most urgent items.  

Albert’s great desire to improve his family’s living conditions seemed unrealistic due to a lack of money, until he made the decision to request a loan with Kiva and its field partner, Nor Horizon.  Albert asks for a loan of 300,000 Armenian drams in order to buy kitchen furniture for his house and also to make a nice surprise for his wife.

loans.use: to buy kitchen furniture for his house and also to make a nice surprise for his wife.

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
Lusine is 35 years old and she lives with her husband and school-aged son in Vanadzor city in the Lori region. Lusine has a higher education and a specialty of teaching. She is a specialist in the Armenian Language and Literature, but she notes with great regret that she never managed to work in her specialty. It is already 5 years that she has been running her own clothes trading business. 

She rents a stall at the city wholesale market and she does everything about this business with the great help of her husband. She sells men's and children's clothes. She brings all the merchandise from the Yerevan wholesale market.
